name: DatePicker
desc: A control for selecting an absolute date.

items.name: init(selection: Binding<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date with an unbounded range.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, selection: Binding<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date with an unbounded range.

items.name: init<S>(S, selection: Binding<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date within the given range.

items.name: init(selection: Binding<Date>, in: ClosedRange<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date in a closed range.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, selection: Binding<Date>, in: ClosedRange<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date in a closed range.

items.name: init<S>(S, selection: Binding<Date>, in: ClosedRange<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date in a closed range.

items.name: init(selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeFrom<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or after some start date.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeFrom<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or after some start date.

items.name: init<S>(S, selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeFrom<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or after some start date.

items.name: init(selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeThrough<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or before some end date.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeThrough<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or before some end date.

items.name: init<S>(S, selection: Binding<Date>, in: PartialRangeThrough<Date>, displayedComponents: DatePicker<Label>.Components)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects a Date on or before some end date.

items.name: func datePickerStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for date pickers within this view.

items.name: protocol DatePickerStyle
items.desc: A type that specifies the appearance and interaction of all date pickers within a view hierarchy.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
